name: Tarmex
description: TARM is the native token of Tarmex Exchange, which was launched back in 2020 as a profit-sharing token that allows traders to draw value from the exchange. It was issued as an BEP-20 token running on the Binance Smart Chain network. The total supply of TARM was set at 330 million. In the long run, TARM performs as the key to the entire Tarmex ecosystem. More details will likely be released in the near future. Tarmex voting system is regarded as one of the best ways to get projects listed on platform and even earn rewards by TARM. Users who participate in our Voting can get rewards. The amount of rewards that users can get depends on the number of TARM tokens spend on Voting. We are working to develop unique future which will allow TARM token holders become a shareholder of Tarmex Exchange. Depends on TARM tokens which user holds he will get monthly dividends from total exchange earnings. You can use TARM tokens also for Staking with high APR and get passive income.
